name: BlockGame - Virtual Christmas Present
description:
Merry Christmas, and Happy New Year to and yours from the MissionaryGamer.

This was a learning tutorial from Unreal Engine, but my kids have so much fun with it, decided to share it with you for a virtual Christmas Present.

***IMPORTANT NOTE*** As this was a training tutorial, it doesn't have a save option.

Even so, it's still a lot of fun.

Controls listed below in images - Double Click Jump quickly start/stop flying.
